name: lab-2

scripts.copy-assets: mkdirp public/bootstrap/css public/bootstrap/js public/popper && copyfiles -u 2 "node_modules/bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css" "public/bootstrap/css/" && copyfiles -u 2 "node_modules/bootstrap/dist/js/bootstrap.bundle.min.js" "public/bootstrap/js/" && copyfiles -u 2 "node_modules/@popperjs/core/dist/umd/popper.min.js" "public/popper/"

author: EmanuelAngel
description: Medical Web App for Laboratory 2 subject
